questions.question: What is BuildFast?
questions.answer: BuildFast is a NextJS boilerplate with all you need to build your SaaS product Landing page. Super easy to customize.This is app is super cool as a user if you are planning to build a SaaS product. It has all the features you need to get started. It is a great starting point for your next project.

questions.question: How do I get started?
questions.answer: You can get started by clicking the Get Started button on the top right corner of the page.

questions.question: What is the price?
questions.answer: BuildFast is free for the first 1000 customers.
